brainly_data.question:
Which is an example of the media helping to shape the public agenda?

An individual posts photos of his trip to the state capitol on a weblog.

A radio show broadcasts the countdown of the week’s most popular songs.

A TV network broadcasts coverage of a fashion event held by top designers.

A newspaper headlines a front-page story about a debated political issue.
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question:
Which is an example of the media helping to shape the public agenda?

An individual posts photos of his trip to the state capitol on a weblog.

A radio show broadcasts the countdown of the week’s most popular songs.

A TV network broadcasts coverage of a fashion event held by top designers.

A newspaper headlines a front-page story about a debated political issue.
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: The media shapes public agenda by bringing forth the popular issues and sharing information about the topic. The most fitting answer would be the fourth choice.

all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text:
Hi there!!


I would say your answer is D. A newspaper headlines a front page story about a debated political issue.


Hope that helps!!

Tenga Día Fántastico!!! (Have a fantastic day)
